name: business-simulation-game
description: A comprehensive business simulation game with real-time collaboration and scoring

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run deploy:backend:staging && npm run deploy:frontend:staging
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist logs
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
